attributes.action: Award front line NHS carers a medal of thanks and monetary gift.
attributes.additional_details: I dont think this needs explanation.  These people are risking their lives daily and continuously as well as risking their families too.  The are fighting to save lives and care for everyone who has been struck by this epidemic.  This country owes these people a huge debt.
attributes.background: Reward those wonderful people Nurses, carers, doctors with a medal of thanks from a grateful populus with a gold medal for the families who lost a member of their family who was working on the front line.   In addition a monetary gift to the nurses and doctors who worked in the intensive care units.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action.

Award Covid-19 medals to all emergency services and involved armed forces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302613

A medal to honour the fortitude of people working in essential occupations: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308035

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
